backend/main.mo: Defines the actor and extensive types for media processing jobs, including audio/video editing flags, metadata, and storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence reports mapping requested DSP and UI features to relevant frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregates brief summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in the app architecture.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including lamejs for MP3 encoding and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, profile setup flow, and routing to dashboard or login.
frontend/src/components/AdvancedAudioEdi: Full in-browser audio editor UI with DSP controls, strength sliders, previews, and processing workflow.
frontend/src/components/AudioABPreviewPl: Audio player component allowing A/B comparison between original and edited audio with playback, seeking, volume, and source switching.
frontend/src/components/DualWaveformDisp: Canvas-based waveform visualizer that uses an AnalyserNode to draw real-time audio waveforms from a provided audio element.
frontend/src/components/FileUpload.tsx: Handles audio/video file selection, validation, upload, processing options, and preview, supporting multiple editing modes and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Static footer displaying branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with theme toggle and Internet Identity login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/JobsList.tsx: Displays user job history placeholder UI with mode-specific icons and loading state.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Landing page prompting user login with marketing content and feature highlights for the editing suite.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting the user to enter their name and create a profile via a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/SpectralFrequenc: Canvas-based audio frequency visualizer that initializes an analyser node from an HTMLAudioElement and renders animated spectral bars.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedVideoEdit: Large unified video editor component managing timeline clips, video playback, and numerous AI-driven video effects with React state and refs.
Side‑by‑side video comparison player with synchronized playback, effect-aware rendering, and optional real-time neural preview logic.
frontend/src/components/VideoPreviewMana: Minimal UI for toggling video enhancement effects and emitting layer/effect changes for previews.
frontend/src/docs/video-smoke-test-check: Markdown checklist outlining smoke tests for video upload, editing, preview, comparison, history, and export workflows.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, auto‑invalidating dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing authentication state, identity loading, login, logout, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and uploading media with extensive AI effect parameters.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, setting color tokens and global styling.
frontend/src/lib/aiAudioOrchestrator.ts: Implements audio analysis, AI-driven audio processing plan generation, and summarization based on user prompts.
frontend/src/lib/audioProcessor.ts: Runs multi-stage DSP audio processing in the browser using Web Audio API, including noise suppression, isolation, EQ, and repair.
frontend/src/lib/dsp/dspTypes.ts: Declares DSP configuration types and utilities for mapping strength values into DSP parameters.
frontend/src/lib/dsp/stageBuilders.ts: Builds reusable Web Audio DSP chains such as noise suppression, transient reduction, and voice isolation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: React dashboard page with tabbed navigation for video editor, file upload, and job history, wiring state for mode selection and refresh on upload.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, container settings, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app architecture, current goals, and known issues for the React + Motoko media editing system.
